comments:
Our headless application that uses WTP is failing on WTP 1.0.1
on ear import. Seems like 1.0.1 needs a facet runtime configured.
which is not the behaviour on 1.0.0.

This is fixed for the 1/13/06 WTP 1.0.1 committers build.  

The operation will now allow a null runtime as in 1.0.0.
